Blake_Wise:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Blake Wise | image = | alt = | caption = | image_size = | birth_name = | alias = | birth_date = ca. 1989 | birth_place = [[Nebo, North Carolina]] | death_place = | origin = | instrument = Vocals | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = | years_active = 2008–present | label = [[Equity Music Group]]
[[Broken Bow Records|Broken Bow]] | associated_acts = | website = }} '''Blake Wise''' is an American [[country music]] singer from [[Nebo, North Carolina]]. He is signed to the independent [[Broken Bow Records]], for which he has released three singles: "Cornfields," "I've Got This Feeling" and "Can't Live Without." ==Biography== Wise learned to play guitar at age four and began touring with his father at age thirteen. Two years later, a record label manager encouraged Wise to move to [[Nashville, Tennessee]] once Wise had turned eighteen.{{cite web |url=http://www.gactv.com/gac/ar_artists_a-z/article/0,,GAC_26071_6027290,00.html |archive-url=https://archive.today/20120731043410/http://www.gactv.com/gac/ar_artists_a-z/article/0,,GAC_26071_6027290,00.html |url-status=dead |archive-date=31 July 2012 |title=Blake Wise biography (page 1) |work=[[Great American Country]] |accessdate=29 November 2010 }} Wise signed to [[Equity Music Group]] in 2008 at age nineteen.{{cite web |url=https://news.google.com/newspapers?id=wpU1AAAAIBAJ&sjid=DygMAAAAIBAJ&pg=1702,3303966&dq=blake-wise&hl=en |title=Blake Wise to perform at Nashville Sound |date=30 March 2008 |work=Elizabethton Star |accessdate=29 November 2010}} The label closed soon afterward, and he signed to [[Broken Bow Records]] in September 2009.{{cite web |url=http://www.gactv.com/gac/ar_artists_a-z/article/0,3028,GAC_26071_6027290_02,00.html |archive-url=https://archive.today/20120905090418/http://www.gactv.com/gac/ar_artists_a-z/article/0,3028,GAC_26071_6027290_02,00.html |url-status=dead |archive-date=5 September 2012 |title=Blake Wise biography (page 2) |work=Great American Country |accessdate=29 November 2010 }} Broken Bow released his single "Cornfields" in mid-2010,{{cite web |url=http://www.roughstock.com/blog/blake-wise-cornfields- |title=Blake Wise — "Cornfields" |last=Bjorke |first=Matt |publisher=Roughstock |accessdate=29 November 2010 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110102102937/http://www.roughstock.com/blog/blake-wise-cornfields- |archivedate=2 January 2011 }} followed by "I've Got This Feeling" later in the year. This song debuted at number 59 on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs]] chart dated for the week ending December 11, 2010.{{cite magazine |url=http://www.billboard.com/column/chartbeat/chart-highlights-adult-contemporary-country-1004132021.story#/column/chartbeat/chart-highlights-adult-contemporary-country-1004132021.story |title=Billboard chart highlights |date=29 November 2010 |magazine=Billboard |accessdate=29 November 2010 |archive-date=1 December 2010 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20101201011313/http://www.billboard.com/column/chartbeat/chart-highlights-adult-contemporary-country-1004132021.story#/column/chartbeat/chart-highlights-adult-contemporary-country-1004132021.story |url-status=dead }} A third single, "Can't Live Without," was released in September 2011. ==Discography== ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Single ! colspan="1"| Peak positions |- ! style="width:6.5em;font-size:75%;"|[[Hot Country Songs|US Country]] |- | rowspan="2"| 2010 ! scope="row"| "Cornfields" | — |- ! scope="row"| "I've Got This Feeling" | 54 |- | 2011 ! scope="row"| "Can't Live Without" | — |- | colspan="3" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes releases that did not chart |- |} ===Music videos=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Year ! style="width:14em;"| Video ! Director |- | 2011 ! scope="row"| "Can't Live Without" | John Fucile |- |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[https://web.archive.org/web/20110107131908/http://blakewise.com/ Official website] {{authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Wise, Blake}} [[Category:1980s births]] [[Category:American country singer-songwriters]] [[Category:American male singer-songwriters]] [[Category:BBR Music Group artists]] [[Category:Equity Music Group artists]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Singer-songwriters from North Carolina]] [[Category:People from McDowell County, North Carolina]] [[Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters]] [[Category:Country musicians from North Carolina]] [[Category:21st-century American male singers]]
